name: Cyberspace Princess Niangniang
text: If a Level 3 monster(s) is Normal or Special Summoned to your field, while this card is in your GY: You can Special Summon this card, and if you do, it is treated as a Tuner, but banish it when it leaves the field, also you cannot Special Summon monsters for the rest of this turn, except Level/Rank 3 or higher monsters. If this card is banished: You can target 1 of your other banished cards; shuffle it into the Deck. You can only use each effect of "Cyberspace Princess Niangniang" once per turn.
